mapper.select: select * from books order by rand(curdate()) limit 0,#{number};
select books.*,r.islike as islike,r.isfavour as isfavour from books left join relationship r on books.bookid=r.bookid and r.userid=#{userid} order by rand(curdate()) limit 0,#{number};
SELECT books.*,r.islike as islike,r.isfavour as isfavour FROM books left join relationship r on books.bookid=r.bookid and r.userid=#{userid} ORDER BY (likes + favorites + downloads) DESC LIMIT 10
